00079  since the DBG002 app is not part of the project. All the macros are defined
00080  as empty*/ 
00081 #ifndef _DBG002_H_
00082 
00083 #define DBG002_RegisterCallBack(A,B,C)
00084 #define DBG002_I(e) 
00085 #define DBG002_IG(e,g) 
00086 #define DBG002_IH(e,h) 
00087 #define DBG002_IP(e,p) 
00088 #define DBG002_IGH(e,g,h) 
00089 #define DBG002_IGP(e,g,p) 
00090 #define DBG002_IHP(e,h,p) 
00091 #define DBG002_IGHP(e,g,h,p) 
00092 #define DBG002_N(e) 
00093 #define DBG002_NG(e,g) 
00094 #define DBG002_NH(e,h) 
00095 #define DBG002_NP(e,p) 
00096 #define DBG002_NGH(e,g,h) 
00097 #define DBG002_NGP(e,g,p) 
00098 #define DBG002_NHP(e,h,p) 
00099 #define DBG002_NGHP(e,g,h,p) 
00100 #define DBG002_ID(e) 
00101 #define DBG002_IS(e) 
00102 #define DBG002_ISG(e,g) 
00103 #define DBG002_SAFETY_CRITICAL(groupid,messageid,length,value)
00104 #define DBG002_CRITICAL(groupid,messageid,length,value)
00105 #define DBG002_ERROR(groupid,messageid,length,value)
00106 #define DBG002_WARNING(groupid,messageid,length,value)
00107 #define DBG002_INFO(groupid,messageid,length,value)
00108 #define DBG002_TRACE(groupid,messageid,length,value)

00110 #define DBG002_FUNCTION_EXIT(GID, Status)

00170 /*******************************************************************************
00171 **                      Private Constant Definitions                          **
00172 *******************************************************************************/
00173 const uint32_t RTC001_DAYS_IN_MONTH[13] =
00174 {
00175    /* Index from 1, hence skip 0*/
00176     0U,
00177     /*Jan, Feb, Mar, Apr, May, Jun, Jul, Aug, Sep, Oct, Nov, Dec*/
00178        31U,28U, 31U, 30U, 31U, 30U, 31U, 31U, 30U, 31U, 30U, 31U
00179 };
00180 #define RTC001_DAYS_IN_AN_YEAR     (365U)
00181 #define RTC001_SECONDS_IN_A_DAY    (24U * 60U * 60U)
00182 #define RTC001_SECONDS_IN_AN_HOUR  (60U * 60U)
00183 #define RTC001_SECONDS_IN_A_MINUTE (60U)
00184 #define RTC001_EPOCH_YEAR          (1970U)

00195 
00196 /*
00197  *  Initialization function for the app. Configures the registers
00198  *  based on options selected in UI.
00199  */ 
00200 
00201 static void  RTC001_lInit(const RTC001_HandleType* Handle)
00202 {
00203 
00204   status_t status = (uint32_t) DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00205    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_1>>> */
00206   DBG002_FUNCTION_ENTRY(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00207 
00208   /* Clear Mirror register update status of RTC registers in SCU*/
00209   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = \
00210       (SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_CTR_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM0_Msk | \
00211                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM1_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM0_Msk |\
00212                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM1_Msk);
00213   
00214   if ((((RTC->CTR & RTC_CTR_ENB_Msk) >> RTC_CTR_ENB_Pos) == 0U ) ||\
00215     (Handle->RTCInitOnce != 1U))
00216   {
00217      /* RTC disabled to set the time */
00218      status = RTC001_Disable();
00219      /*assert status = DAVEApp_SUCCESS*/
00220      DBG002_I (status = DAVEApp_SUCCESS);
00221      /* Calendar time and date set in RTC registers */
00222      status |= RTC001_Clock_SetTime(&timeptr1);
00223      /*assert status = DAVEApp_SUCCESS*/
00224      DBG002_I (status = DAVEApp_SUCCESS);
00225 
00226   }
00227   
00228   /* Enable the RTC module */
00229   RTC->CTR |= ((uint32_t)(RTC_CTR_ENB_Msk));
00230   /* Wait for Mirror register update and clear the update indication */
00231   while((SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Msk) == 0U) 
00232   {}
00233   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Msk;
00234         
00235   /*configure RTC prescaler*/
00236   WR_REGHIB(RTC->CTR, RTC_CTR_DIV_Msk, RTC_CTR_DIV_Pos, \
00237            (uint32_t)Handle->DividerValue, SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Msk); 
00238    
00239   if (status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00240   {
00241     DBG002_ERROR(DBG002_GID_RTC001,status, 0, NULL);
00242   }
00243   DBG002_FUNCTION_EXIT(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00244 }
00245

00264 void RTC001_Init()

00274 void  RTC001_DeInit(void)

00278         
00279   DBG002_FUNCTION_EXIT(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00280 }
00281 
00282 
00283 /*
00284  *  The function enables the RTC module.
00285  */
00286 status_t  RTC001_Enable(void)
00287 {
00288   status_t status = (uint32_t) RTC001_ERROR;
00289   DBG002_FUNCTION_ENTRY(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00290    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_3>>> */
00291  
00292   /* Clear Mirror register update status of RTC registers in SCU*/
00293   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR |= (uint32_t)\
00294     (SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_CTR_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM0_Msk |\
00295         SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM1_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM0_Msk |\
00296                                                                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM1_Msk);
00297   /* Enable RTC module */
00298   RTC->CTR |= (uint32_t)(RTC_CTR_ENB_Msk);
00299   /* Wait for Mirror register update and clear the update indication */
00300   while((SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Msk) == 0U) 
00301   {}
00302   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Msk;       
00303   
00304   status = (uint32_t) DAVEApp_SUCCESS;  
00305   DBG002_FUNCTION_EXIT(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00306   return status;
00307 }
00308 
00309 
00310 /*
00311  *  The function disables the RTC module.
00312  */
00313  
00314 status_t  RTC001_Disable(void)  
00315 {
00316   status_t status = (uint32_t) RTC001_ERROR;
00317   DBG002_FUNCTION_ENTRY(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00318    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_4>>> */
00319 
00320   /* Disable the RTC module*/
00321   RTC->CTR &= (uint32_t) (~(RTC_CTR_ENB_Msk));
00322   /* Wait for Mirror register update and clear the update indication */
00323   while((SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Msk) == 0U) 
00324   {}
00325   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Msk;       
00326 
00327   /* Clear the RTC Time registers */
00328   while((SCU_GENERAL->MIRRSTS & SCU_GENERAL_MIRRSTS_RTC_TIM0_Msk)!= 0x0U)
00329   {}
00330   RTC->TIM0 = 0x00000000U;
00331   while((SCU_GENERAL->MIRRSTS & SCU_GENERAL_MIRRSTS_RTC_TIM1_Msk)!= 0x0U)
00332   {}
00333   RTC->TIM1 = 0x00000000U;
00334 
00335   /* Clear the Alarm registers */
00336   while((SCU_GENERAL->MIRRSTS & SCU_GENERAL_MIRRSTS_RTC_ATIM0_Msk)!= 0x0U)
00337   {}
00338   RTC->ATIM0 = 0x00000000U;
00339   while((SCU_GENERAL->MIRRSTS & SCU_GENERAL_MIRRSTS_RTC_ATIM1_Msk)!= 0x0U)
00340   {}
00341   RTC->ATIM1 = 0x00000000U;
00342   /* Clear Mirror register update status of RTC registers in SCU*/
00343   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR |= (uint32_t)\
00344     (SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_CTR_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM0_Msk |\
00345         SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM1_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM0_Msk |\
00346         SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM1_Msk);
00347                                                                 
00348   status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00349   DBG002_FUNCTION_EXIT(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00350   return status;
00351 }
00352 
00353 
00354 /*
00355  *  The function gets RTC status flag for Alarm and Periodic Timer Events.
00356  */     
00357 status_t  RTC001_GetFlagStatus(RTC001_FlagType Flag)
00358 {
00359   status_t status = (uint32_t) RTC001_RESET;
00360   uint32_t TempValue = 0U;
00361   /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_6>>> */
00362   DBG002_FUNCTION_ENTRY(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00363 
00364   /*read the Status Service Request Register*/
00365   TempValue = RTC->STSSR;
00366   
00367   /*check the given flag*/
00368         if((TempValue & (uint32_t) Flag) != 0U)
00369         {
00370           status = (uint32_t) RTC001_SET;
00371         }
00372 
00373         DBG002_FUNCTION_EXIT(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00374         return status;
00375 }
00376 
00377 
00378 /*
00379  *  The function clears RTC status flag for Alarm and Periodic Timer Events.
00380  */
00381 void  RTC001_ClearFlagStatus(RTC001_FlagType Flag)
00382 {
00383   /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_5>>> */
00384   DBG002_FUNCTION_ENTRY(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00385   
00386   /*write to the Clear Service Request Register*/
00387   RTC->CLRSR |= (uint32_t)Flag;
00388 
00389         DBG002_FUNCTION_EXIT(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00390 }
00391 
00392 
00393 /*
00394  *  Interface to configure the RTC alarm.
00395  */
00396 
00397 status_t RTC001_ConfigAlarm (const RTC001_HandleType* Handle, 
00398     RTC001_TimeHandle* timeptr, AlarmCallBackPtr CallBack,uint32_t CbArg)
00399 {
00400   uint16_t m1 = 0U,y1 = 0U,d1 = 0U;
00401   status_t status = (uint32_t)RTC001_ERROR;
00402   /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_11>>> */
00403   DBG002_FUNCTION_ENTRY(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00404   do
00405   {
00406     /* <<<DD_RTC001 _API_4>>> */
00407     /* Clear Mirror register update status of RTC registers in SCU*/
00408     SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (uint32_t)\
00409       (SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_CTR_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM0_Msk | \
00410                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM1_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM0_Msk |\
00411                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM1_Msk);      
00412 
00413     /* Register the call back function with NVIC_SCU001 */              
00414     if(CallBack != NULL)
00415     {    
00416             NVIC_SCU001_RegisterCallback(NVIC_SCU001_AI,CallBack,CbArg);
00417           } 
00418     /*   Write values into ATIM0 and ATIM1 registers  */
00419     m1 = timeptr->Month;
00420     y1 = timeptr->Year;
00421     d1 = timeptr->Days;
00422     /* Check whether the date entered is valid */
00423     if (RTC001_ldatevalid(m1,d1,y1))
00424     { 
00425       /*Wait until any transfer over serial interface to ATIM0 is completed*/
00426       while((SCU_GENERAL->MIRRSTS & SCU_GENERAL_MIRRSTS_RTC_ATIM0_Msk)!= 0x0U)
00427       {}   
00428       /*Configure the Alarm Time Register 0 */
00429       RTC->ATIM0 = (uint32_t)\
00430                (((timeptr->Sec) & (uint32_t)RTC_ATIM0_ASE_Msk) | \
00431               ((((uint32_t)timeptr->Min) << RTC_ATIM0_AMI_Pos) & \
00432                                   (uint32_t)RTC_ATIM0_AMI_Msk) | \
00433             ((((uint32_t)timeptr->Hours) << RTC_ATIM0_AHO_Pos) & \
00434                                   (uint32_t)RTC_ATIM0_AHO_Msk) | \
00435         (((((uint32_t)timeptr->Days)-1U) << RTC_ATIM0_ADA_Pos) & \
00436                                   (uint32_t)RTC_ATIM0_ADA_Msk));
00437 
00438       /*Wait until any transfer over serial interface to ATIM1 is completed*/        
00439       while((SCU_GENERAL->MIRRSTS & SCU_GENERAL_MIRRSTS_RTC_ATIM1_Msk)!= 0x0U)
00440       {}   
00441       /*Configure the Alarm Time Register 1 */
00442       RTC->ATIM1 = (uint32_t)\
00443            ((((((uint32_t)timeptr->Month)-1U) << RTC_ATIM1_AMO_Pos) & \
00444                                        (uint32_t)RTC_ATIM1_AMO_Msk) | \
00445         ((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)timeptr->Year) << RTC_ATIM1_AYE_Pos) & \
00446                                        (uint32_t)RTC_ATIM1_AYE_Msk));
00447       status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;   
00448     }  
00449     else /*date is not valid*/
00450     {
00451       status = (uint32_t)RTC001_INVALID_HANDLE;
00452       DBG002_ERROR(DBG002_GID_RTC001,status, 0, NULL);
00453     }
00454  
00455   }while(0);
00456   DBG002_FUNCTION_EXIT(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00457   return status;
00458 }
00459         
00460 
00461 /*
00462  *  Function to read the current RTC time
00463  */
00464  
00465 status_t RTC001_Clock_GetTime (RTC001_TimeHandle* timeptr)
00466 {
00467   status_t status = (uint32_t)RTC001_ERROR;
00468   uint32_t temp0,temp1;
00469   temp0 = RTC->TIM0;
00470   temp1 = RTC->TIM1;
00471   DBG002_FUNCTION_ENTRY(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00472    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_12>>> */
00473 
00474   /*   Read values from TIM0 and TIM1 registers  */
00475   /*   Days of Week value  */
00476         timeptr->DaWe = (uint8_t)(temp1 & RTC_TIM1_DAWE_Msk);
00477   /*   Month value  */
00478         timeptr->Month = \
00479           (uint8_t)(((temp1 & RTC_TIM1_MO_Msk) >> RTC_TIM1_MO_Pos) + 1U);
00480   /*   Year value  */
00481         timeptr->Year = (uint16_t)((temp1 & RTC_TIM1_YE_Msk) >> RTC_TIM1_YE_Pos);
00482 
00483   /*   Seconds value  */
00484         timeptr->Sec =  (uint8_t)((temp0 & RTC_TIM0_SE_Msk));
00485   /*   Minutes value  */
00486         timeptr->Min = (uint8_t)(((temp0 & RTC_TIM0_MI_Msk) >> RTC_TIM0_MI_Pos));
00487   /*   Hours value  */
00488         timeptr->Hours = (uint8_t)(((temp0 & RTC_TIM0_HO_Msk) >> RTC_TIM0_HO_Pos));
00489   /*   Days value starting from the 1st day of the month */
00490         timeptr->Days = \
00491           (uint8_t)(((temp0 & RTC_TIM0_DA_Msk) >> RTC_TIM0_DA_Pos) + 1U);
00492         status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00493   DBG002_FUNCTION_EXIT(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00494   return status;
00495 }
00496 
00497 
00498 /*
00499  *  This function is to set the time.
00500  */
00501 status_t RTC001_Clock_SetTime(RTC001_TimeHandle* timeptr)
00502 {
00503   uint16_t m1 = 0U,y1 = 0U,d1 = 0U;
00504   uint32_t weekDay = 0U;
00505   status_t status = (uint32_t)RTC001_ERROR;
00506   
00507   DBG002_FUNCTION_ENTRY(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00508    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_13>>> */
00509   
00510 
00511 
00512   /* Clear Mirror register update status of RTC registers in SCU*/
00513   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = \
00514       (SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_CTR_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM0_Msk | \
00515                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM1_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM0_Msk |\
00516                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM1_Msk);
00517  
00518   /*   Days of Week value  */
00519   m1 = timeptr->Month;
00520   y1 = timeptr->Year;
00521   d1 = timeptr->Days;
00522   
00523   do
00524   {    
00525     if (RTC001_ldatevalid(m1,d1,y1))
00526     { 
00527       weekDay = ((uint32_t)(RTC001_lweekday(m1,d1,y1)));
00528       if(weekDay < 6U)
00529       {
00530         weekDay += 1U;
00531       }
00532       else if(weekDay == 6U)
00533       {
00534         weekDay = 0U;
00535       }
00536       else
00537       {
00538         status = (uint32_t)RTC001_INVALID_HANDLE;
00539         DBG002_ERROR(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_INVALID_HANDLE, 0, NULL);
00540         break;
00541       }
00542       /*Write values into TIM0 and TIM1 registers  */
00543       /*wait until any serial transaction is completed*/
00544       while((SCU_GENERAL->MIRRSTS & SCU_GENERAL_MIRRSTS_RTC_TIM0_Msk)!= 0x0U)
00545       {}
00546       /*Configure RTC Time register 0*/
00547       RTC->TIM0 = (uint32_t)\
00548                (((timeptr->Sec) & (uint32_t)RTC_TIM0_SE_Msk) | \
00549               ((((uint32_t)timeptr->Min) << RTC_TIM0_MI_Pos) & \
00550                                   (uint32_t)RTC_TIM0_MI_Msk) | \
00551             ((((uint32_t)timeptr->Hours) << RTC_TIM0_HO_Pos) & \
00552                                   (uint32_t)RTC_TIM0_HO_Msk) | \
00553       ((((((uint32_t)timeptr->Days)-1U)) << RTC_TIM0_DA_Pos) & \
00554                                   (uint32_t)RTC_TIM0_DA_Msk));      
00555       /*wait until any serial transaction is completed*/
00556       while((SCU_GENERAL->MIRRSTS & SCU_GENERAL_MIRRSTS_RTC_TIM1_Msk)!= 0x0U)
00557       {}     
00558       /*Configure RTC Time register 1*/
00559       RTC->TIM1 = (uint32_t) (weekDay |\
00560                    (((((uint32_t)timeptr->Month)-1U) << RTC_TIM1_MO_Pos) & \
00561                                               (uint32_t)RTC_TIM1_MO_Msk) | \
00562                          ((((uint32_t)timeptr->Year) << RTC_TIM1_YE_Pos) & \
00563                                               (uint32_t)RTC_TIM1_YE_Msk));
00564 
00565       status = (uint32_t) DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00566     }  
00567     else
00568     {
00569       status = (uint32_t) RTC001_INVALID_HANDLE;
00570       DBG002_ERROR(DBG002_GID_RTC001,status, 0, NULL);
00571     }
00572   }while(0);
00573 
00574   DBG002_FUNCTION_EXIT(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00575   return status;
00576 }
00577 
00578 
00579 /*
00580  *  This function is to get the time in seconds calculated from Epoch time (01/01/1970).
00581  */
00582 
00583 status_t RTC001_Time(time_t* time_value)
00584 {
00585 
00586   uint32_t CurrentYear = 0U, ElapsedYear = 0U;
00587   uint32_t CurrentMonth = 0U, ElapsedMonth = 0U;
00588   uint32_t CurrentDay = 0U, ElapsedDays = 0U;
00589   uint32_t CurrentHour = 0U;
00590   uint32_t CurrentMin = 0U;
00591   uint32_t CurrentSec = 0U;
00592   uint32_t ElapsedSeconds = 0U;
00593   status_t Status = (uint32_t)RTC001_ERROR; 
00594   
00595   DBG002_FUNCTION_ENTRY(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00596    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_15>>> */
00597   
00598   /*check if RTC module is enabled and no NULL pointer*/
00599   if(((RTC->CTR & (RTC_CTR_ENB_Msk)) != 0U) && (time_value != NULL))
00600   {
00601 
00602     /*   Read values from TIM0 and TIM1 registers  */
00603     CurrentYear = ((uint32_t)((RTC->TIM1 & RTC_TIM1_YE_Msk) >> 16U));
00604     CurrentMonth =      ((uint32_t)(((RTC->TIM1 & RTC_TIM1_MO_Msk) >> 8U) + 1U));
00605     CurrentDay = ((uint32_t)(((RTC->TIM0 & RTC_TIM0_DA_Msk) >> 24U) + 1U));
00606     CurrentHour = ((uint32_t)(((RTC->TIM0 & RTC_TIM0_HO_Msk) >> 16U)));
00607     CurrentMin = ((uint32_t)(((RTC->TIM0 & RTC_TIM0_MI_Msk) >> 8U)));
00608     CurrentSec = ((uint32_t)((RTC->TIM0 & RTC_TIM0_SE_Msk)));
00609     
00610     /*Count number of Days for Elapsed Years since Epoch*/
00611     ElapsedDays = (uint32_t)(CurrentYear - RTC001_EPOCH_YEAR) *\
00612                   (uint32_t) RTC001_DAYS_IN_AN_YEAR;
00613 
00614     /* Add the number of days to be adjusted for leap years, 
00615     start from previous year and check backwords */
00616     for (ElapsedYear=(CurrentYear-1U); ElapsedYear>= 1970U; ElapsedYear--)
00617     {
00618       if((((ElapsedYear) % 400U) == 0U) || \
00619         ((((ElapsedYear) % 100U) != 0U) && (((ElapsedYear) %4U) == 0U)))
00620       {
00621         ElapsedDays++;
00622       }
00623     }
00624     /*if current year is leap year add 1 only if March or later*/
00625     if((((CurrentYear) % 400U) == 0U) || \
00626       ((((CurrentYear) % 100U) != 0U) && (((CurrentYear) %4U) == 0U)))
00627     {
00628       if(CurrentMonth > 2U)
00629       {
00630         ElapsedDays++;
00631       }
00632     }
00633     
00634     /*Add number of Days from Elapsed months from current year*/
00635     for (ElapsedMonth = (CurrentMonth - 1U); ElapsedMonth != 0U; ElapsedMonth--)
00636     {
00637       ElapsedDays += RTC001_DAYS_IN_MONTH[ElapsedMonth];  
00638     } 
00639     
00640     /*add Elapsed days from current month*/
00641     ElapsedDays += CurrentDay - 1U;
00642     
00643     /*Accumulate the total seconds for ElapsedDays*/
00644     ElapsedSeconds = (ElapsedDays * RTC001_SECONDS_IN_A_DAY);
00645 
00646     /*Add seconds for current hour, minute and seconds*/
00647     ElapsedSeconds += (CurrentHour * RTC001_SECONDS_IN_AN_HOUR);   
00648     ElapsedSeconds += (CurrentMin * RTC001_SECONDS_IN_A_MINUTE); 
00649     ElapsedSeconds += CurrentSec; 
00650 
00651     *time_value = (time_t) ElapsedSeconds;
00652     Status = (uint32_t) DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00653     
00654   }
00655   DBG002_FUNCTION_EXIT(DBG002_GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00656   return Status;
00657 }
00658 /* return 1 if date is valid, 0 otherwise.      */
00659 static uint32_t RTC001_ldatevalid(uint16_t m,uint16_t d,uint16_t y)
00660 {
00661   uint32_t valid = 0U;
00662 
00663   if ((m == 0U) || (m > 12U) )
00664   {
00665     valid = 0U;
00666   }
00667   else  if ((m != 2U) || (d < 29U))
00668   {
00669      if (d <= RTC001_DAYS_IN_MONTH[m])
00670      {
00671        valid = 1U;
00672      }
00673   }
00674   else /*reaches here only if m = February and day = 29*/
00675   {
00676     /*check if it is leap year*/
00677     if ((((y) % 400U) == 0U) || ((((y) % 100U) != 0U) && (((y) %4U) == 0U)))
00678     {
00679       if (d == 29U)
00680       { 
00681         valid = 1U;
00682       }
00683     }
00684   }
00685   return valid;
00686 }
00687 
00688 /* given month, day, year, returns day of week, eg. Monday = 0 etc.
00689 */ 
00690 
00691 static uint32_t RTC001_lweekday(uint16_t m,uint16_t d,uint16_t y)
00692 {
00693   uint16_t vx, tx, ix, feb;
00694   const uint8_t vx_list[] = 
00695   {
00696       0U, 20U, 0U, 16U, 24U, 20U, 0U, 24U, 4U, 12U, 8U, 16U, 12U
00697   };
00698 
00699   vx = vx_list[m];
00700   if(y > 1900U)
00701   {
00702     y = y - 1900U;
00703   }
00704   feb = (m  > 2U)? 1U : 0U;
00705 /* take care of February */
00706   ix = ((y - 21U) % 28U) + vx + feb;
00707 /* take care of leap year */
00708   tx = ((ix + (ix / 4U)) % 7U) + d;
00709   tx = tx % 7U;
00710   return ((uint32_t)tx);
00711 }
